body.p:
Springfield
Augt 14th 1861
Govr Magoffin
Dr Sir

Some days ago Jetsin Moore a Justice in the Willisburg district of this County No. 6 died and I have recd a petition from a number of the citizens residents of that district requesting ^me to recommend^ you to appoint John Rodgers to fill the vacancy occasioned by the death of said Moore -- I am satisfied that the appointment if made if made will meet the approval of a large portion of the citizens in the district --

I am very Respectfully
Your friend Officially
and personally
